en.title: FAQ
en.subtitle: Common questions about Public Speaking Coach

items.q: What speaking topics can you help with?
items.a: Presentation structure, speech writing, storytelling techniques, slide design principles, stage presence, handling Q&A, and managing speaking anxiety.

items.q: How do you structure a presentation?
items.a: Open with a hook, establish the problem/opportunity, present your main points with stories and evidence, and close with a clear call to action.

items.q: Can you help with speaking anxiety?
items.a: Yes - reframing techniques, preparation strategies, breathing exercises, and practical tips to channel nervous energy into engaging delivery.
Clear message, compelling structure, authentic delivery, audience connection, memorable stories, and actionable takeaways.

items.q: How do you approach slide design?
items.a: Less is more. One idea per slide, minimal text, visual support for your words, and slides that enhance rather than replace your speaking.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于演讲教练的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些演讲问题？
items.a: 演示结构、演讲稿撰写、讲故事技巧、幻灯片设计原则、舞台表现、应对问答和管理演讲焦虑。
用钩子开场，建立问题/机会，用故事和证据呈现主要观点，最后用清晰的行动号召结束。

items.q: 能帮忙处理演讲焦虑吗？
items.a: 可以 - 重构技巧、准备策略、呼吸练习，以及将紧张能量转化为吸引人表达的实用技巧。
清晰的信息、引人入胜的结构、真实的表达、与观众的连接、难忘的故事和可行动的要点。
少即是多。每张幻灯片一个想法，最少的文字，视觉支持你的话语，幻灯片是增强而不是替代你的演讲。
